name: chips.omp.json
description: Non-Standard Compliant Material Design-Inspired Chips Theme for Oh-My-Posh Theme.

scripts.snapshot: oh-my-posh config export image --author 'CodexLink, More Samples at https://github.com/CodexLink/chips.omp.json' --config chips.omp.json --cursor-padding 50 --rprompt-offset 30 --output assets\highlight.png

author: Janrey "CodexLink" Licas
